newsitem.title: USA: Cincinnati Purchasing Mgrs say May growth up.
newsitem.headline: Cincinnati Purchasing Mgrs say May growth up.

text.p: The Cincinnati chapter of the National Association of Purchasing Management said Friday the area's rate of economic growth increased slightly in May.
The May new orders index was unchanged from April's reading of 27, with production up to 39 from 31.

"The recovery continues, but not as yet at a rate of increase that would create concern in terms of inflation," the group said. "However, any further increases in the recovery could trigger these concerns."
The group said pressure on the labor market in the Cincinnati region "seems to be under control."
